TopicTitle: 0.24 Career Mode Series | Help me reach 100 subs!!

Articles.Content:
I am an avid gamer who recently just finished Secondary School who plays anything from Minecraft to Battlefield to Fallout. I am usually a console gamer, but I recently sold a lot of things and got enough money to buy my self a decent Gaming PC. I will be covering Indie Games as well as AAA titles. I would appreciate any feedback you want to give, either in the comment section of any video or e-mail me. Please stick around for regular content as well as announcements for Livestreams that will happen over on my Twitch.tv channel page!

The Series is just a basic career mode on the brand new update, please check it out and leave me some feedback on the video!
